Package com.leonteqsecurity.WholesaleFoodStore.Service

Class FoodProductService

java.lang.Object
com.leonteqsecurity.WholesaleFoodStore.Service.FoodProductService
All Implemented Interfaces:
FoodProductDAO
@Service public class FoodProductService extends Object implements FoodProductDAO
Service class for managing FoodProduct entities in the Wholesale Food Store application.
